title: Feature Request: Support for RemoteApps
author: boopzz
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->

When using a Terminal Services Server Farm with RemoteApps a **remoteapplicationcmdline:s:** attribute exists to point to a specific RDP file on the terminal server.

The request is to add an option the **remoteapplicationname:s:** and also **remoteapplicationcmdline:s:** attributes to be able to use RemoteApps easily.

This has been requested on JIRA at [https://mremoteng.atlassian.net/browse/MR-457](url)

Also referenced is the mRemote support forum page [http...

iterations.description: RemoteApp support via RDP Alternative Shell properties is a legitimate feature request with an existing PR (#1848) demonstrating feasibility, and it extends mRemoteNG's core RDP protocol handling.

comments.author: jotatsu
comments.snippet: Candidate for 2.0, collection of improvements for external tools.

comments.author: johnwc
comments.snippet:
I have created a PR #1848 that adds the Alternative Shell properties. I will add the others as I have time within the next few weeks.
In order for Alternative Shell to work without the remote server being a RDS server, you will need to make some registry updates as is described in comment #7 in this forum. I have tested it, and it works as expected with notepad.exe as the shell.

notes:
AI triage: RemoteApp support via RDP Alternative Shell properties is a legitimate feature request with an existing PR (#1848) demonstrating feasibility, and it extends mRemoteNG's core RDP protocol handling.
Approach: Add Alternative Shell and Shell Working Directory properties to the RDP connection info, expose them in the connection config UI, and pass them to the RDP ActiveX control when initiating connections to enable RemoteApp functionality.
